loans.use: To install a gate

loans.name: Angela Maritza

texts.es: Ángela Maritza su actividad es la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este medio de vida. Siempre ha sido una persona muy responsable y que disfruta de comunicarse con sus clientes, la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan una gran variedad de productos y ella siempre está dispuesta a brindar el mejor servicio a sus clientes por lo que es una mujer dedicada y abnegada. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de lápiz labial, polvos, pintura de uñas, brillos, tratamientos entre otros.
texts.en:
Ángela Maritza has been selling cosmetics for a living for over three years.  She has always been very responsible and enjoys talking to her customers, most of whom request a wide variety of products.  She is always willing to provide the best customer service she can since she is very dedicated and self-sacrificing.

She plans to use the loan to buy lipstick, face powder, nail polish, gloss and other treatments.

loans.use: To buy lipstick, face powder, nail polish, gloss and other treatments

loans.name: Santos Juan

texts.es: El Sr. Santos es una persona joven y muy trabajadora, vive en la zona de bajo Pampahasi ubicada a veinticinco minutos al este del centro de la ciudad de la paz. Él y su esposa Angélica tienen dos hijos en edad escolar. Santos se dedica al transporte público con un minibús de 9 pasajeros, el cual es de su propiedad, y  esta afiliado al sindicato de transportes. Debido a la antigüedad que tiene santos en su sindicato fue nombrado jefe de grupo de minibuses, con el dinero del crédito realizara mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esta presentan do algunas fallas. Angélica se dedica a la venta de ropa por menor en la cuidad de Cochabamba, viaja una vez por semana (el día viernes) y vuelve al día siguiente para atender a sus hijos. Ellos viven en la casa familiar y uno de sus mayores anhelos es poder comprar una casa propia.
texts.en:
Mr. Santos is a young, hard-working man who lives in the area of lower Pampahasi which is 25 minutes from downtown La Paz.  He and his wife Angélica have two school-aged children.  Santos has a public transportation service and uses a 9-passenger minivan.  He owns the vehicle and is affiliated with the transportation union.  

Because of his seniority in the union, Santos was appointed chief of the minivan group.  He plans to use the loan to cover vehicle maintenance costs because he is beginning to notice some vehicle failure.  Angélica sells clothing in the city of Cochabamba where she travels once a week (Fridays), returning home the next day to care for her children.  They live with other family members and their biggest dream is to buy their own house.

loans.use: To cover vehicle maintenance costs

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: La señora Teodora es una persona muy trabajadora y muy alegre. Ella vive en la zona D. Pampahasi que se encuentra a veinticinco minutos del centro D. la ciudad, vive en casa propia y todos sus hijos ya son mayores e independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta D. dulces y golosinas en un kiosco que esta en una avenida del centro D. la ciudad. Ella trabaja vendiendo en su kiosco desD. hace más D. treinta años. A pesar D. ser una persona mayor ella sale a trabajar desD. muy temprano en la mañana y se queda todo el día en su kiosco. Ella trabaja con emprender desD. hace unos seis años y en ese tiempo siempre demostró ser muy puntual con sus préstamos. Teodora solicita el préstamo para la compra D. chocolates y tarjetas D. teléfono, que son las cosas que mas venD., es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Teodora is a very hardworking and cheerful person. She lives in the Pampahasi area located twenty minutes away from downtown. She lives in her own home and all of her children are grown up and independent. She sells candies and sweets in a kiosk located on a street in downtown. She has been selling in her kiosk for more than thirty years. In spite of her old age she goes out to work very early in the morning and stays all day in the kiosk. She always worked to strive forward and in that time she always demonstrated punctuality with her loans. Teodora is requesting the loan to buy chocolates and telephone cards which are items that sell the most. She is a hardworking and responsible person who is thankful with the support being offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy chocolates and telephone cards

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa C. se dedica a la venta D. flores, estampas D. santos y camándulas a las afueras D. un Cementerio D. la ciudad D. Medellín. Hace 20 años se dedica a esta actividad debido a que la violencia hizo que perdiera 5 D. sus hijos y ella debió salir a trabajar para mantener a su familia. Teresa trabaja junto con un hijo y un nieto quienes le ayudan en la atención del negocio. 

Actualmente Teresa quiere capitalizar su negocio con el fin D. poder ofrecer mejores productos y así crecerlo. Ella espera que eso se traduzca en el aumento D. sus ingresos y D. esta forma poder salir D. la difícil situación por la que ha tenido que pasar.
texts.en:
Teresa C. sells flowers, saint prints, and rosaries in the outskirts of a cemetery in the city of Medellín. She has been working in this business for 20 years since she lost 5 of her children to violence and she had to work to maintain her family. Teresa works alongsiD. her son and grandson who help her attend the business.

At the moment Teresa wants to buy more products to offer more and grow her business. She is hoping that it will also help her make more profits to be able to get out of the difficult situation she has had to go through.

loans.use: to purchase a wider variety of flowers to expand her business

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene L. se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos. Tiene mas 7 años en su negocio. Por lo que siempre le ha gusta do obtener un medio de ingreso para su hogar,  siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona responsable que disfruta de hablar con sus clientes que además son amigos de su comarca. La buena calidad de sus productos han hecho que a Marlene obtenga buena fama en lo que realza. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra queso, cuajada, leche, agua purificada entre otros productos necesarios para la elaboración del queso, cuajada, crema, leche agria entre otros.
texts.en: Marlene L. sells dairy products. She has been in this business for more than 7 years. She has always liked having a form of income for her home. She is always described as being a very responsible person who enjoys talking to her clients who are also friends from her region.  The quality of her products are what have made her well known in her business. She will use the loan to buy cheese, curd, milk, and purified water as well as other products necessary to make cheese, curd, cream, sour milk, etc.

loans.use: to buy cheese, curd, milk, and purified water

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy party supplies, such as gifts for every occasion and all types of paper supplies

loans.name: Juan Jorge

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Jorge F. es una persona muy seria, responsable y dedicada a su hogar, el es un trabajador muy honrado, que con esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a su familia, ya que es el único sostén de su familia en esta ocasión ha solicitado un crédito, para poner un piso de concreto en la cochera de su domicilio, ya que se aproximan las épocas de lluvias y donde el vive se acumula mucho el agua ya que es una colonia donde hay poca población y por lo mismo se encuentra mucha tierra suelta  es por ello que decidió iniciar su proyecto para  ayudarse a mantener mas limpia la casa además de proteger  su automóvil que es el que los mueve a la escuela de sus hijos ,  ella  considera su prestamo como una oportunidad para lograr una  mejor  imagen a  su hogar.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan Jorge F. is a very serious, responsible person who is dedicated to his home life.  He is an honest man who has worked hard as the sole income earner to provide for his family.  He has requested a loan to put a concrete floor in the carport since the rainy season is approaching.  Because of the scarce population in the area there is a lot of loose soil and water accumulation.  

He began the project in order to keep his house clean and protect his automobile which he uses to take his children to school.  The loan will afford him the opportunity to carry out the improvement necessary to make his home nicer.

loans.use: To put in a concrete floor

loans.name: Nelly Del Socorro

texts.es:
Nelly M. es de la ciudad de Medellín. Hace 20 años tiene un negocio donde se dedica a la venta de mercancías. Es soltera y vive con su madre que tiene más de 80 años de edad a quien cuida y mantiene gracias a los ingresos de su negocio.

Ella debe desplazarse con sus artículos para la venta hasta donde sus clientes, que se encuentran en diferentes zonas de la ciudad y muchas veces las fuertes lluvias no le permiten llegar hasta donde sus compradores. Sin embargo Nelly es una mujer emprendedora que quiere con el crédito poder comprar más mercancía como ropa y joyería, para ofrecerle mejores cosas a sus clientes y espera en un futuro poder aumentar su clientela y expandir su negocio.
texts.en:
Nelly M. is from the city of Medellín.  For 20 years she has been selling merchandise as a source of income.  She is single and lives with her mother who is over 80.  She is able to care for her thanks to the earnings from her business.

She sells her goods door-to-door to customers who are distributed throughout the different parts of the city and on many occasions the heavy rainfall keeps her from being able to work.  But Nelly is very enterprising and plans to use the loan to buy more clothing and jewelry so she can offer a wider variety of products and increase her customer base and income.

loans.use: To buy more clothing and jewelry

loans.name: Fuente Para El Desarrollo 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Modesta is a talented and dynamic woman. She lives in the beautiful town of Samana with her husband. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.  Modesta wants to expand her business (a Comedor, home restaurant, where normally clients are from the same community, especially for lunch), into a small restaurant where she can sell breakfast, lunch and dinner. She is excited to receive her 10th loan, and wants to continue improving her business in the future. 

With this loan, she will be able to buy goods to prepare meals, like rice, meat, beans, tables, chairs, etc. She intends to use her business profits to invest in her business, buying more chairs, tables, tablecloths and other items.  

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. 

Thanks for supporting this group of entrepreneurs!

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, beans, tables, chairs, etc.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 42 años, es una mujer muy jovial. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Julio, de 42 años y sus 3 hijos aún menores y están en etapa escolar. Nancy se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida rápida (pollo y papas fritas) en su Stand móvil ubicado a 4 cuadras de su casa, precisamente en la puerta de la casa  de su madre, En este lugar lleva más de 4 años y le va muy bien, por ser un lugar muy concurrido, por la gente que acude al gimnasio, que esta en el segundo piso. En estos años,  este negocio le ha resultado ser muy rentable, por lo que ayuda a su esposo  cubrir los gastos educativos de sus hijos, y de ese modo su esposo esta pagando las letras de su futura casa. Su negocio lo realiza con mucha satisfacción, por ello todas  las mañanas, se provee de pollo y las sazona con paciencia, siendo así la preferencia de sus clientes. Más adelante desea ampliar su negocio con la preparación de jugos, pero lo que si le urge comprarse es una parrilla para freír pollos y de ese modo ir ampliando su negocio. Es el noveno crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere defraudar a sus dos compañeras de su banco comunal  con quienes trabaja, en todo este tiempo y se siente contenta de pertenecer a este grupo. De obtener el crédito que solita, comprará su parrilla, para atender con mayor eficacia a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nancy is 42 years old and very good-humored.  She lives in her own home with her husband Julio, 42, and their three minor, school-aged children.  Nancy makes and sells fast food (chicken and french fries) out of her mobile stand located four blocks away from her house and just outside her mother's house. She's been in this location for over four years and business is going well because it's in a busy place where people go to a nearby gym.

She has made considerable earnings over this period of time and is able to help her husband cover the children's school expenses, so her husband can cover the monthly payment they are making for their future home.  

She enjoys her work and, every morning, patiently prepares the chicken she'll be selling since it is what most customers prefer.  In the future she hopes to expand business to include juices, but what she needs urgently is a grill to cook the chicken.  This is her ninth loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  She is very happy to be a part of the group.  She plans to use the loan to buy a grill so she can provide better customer service.

loans.use: To buy a grill

loans.name: Timoteo

texts.es: El señor Timoteo nacido en Cochabamba El 14 de Octubre de 1955 hace 41 año que el se vino  a radicar a Santa C. a buscar mejor vida y lo encontró en los amarillos a 15 km de Limoncito, el tiene su esposa la Sra. Peregrina y sus 2 hijos. El tiene 10 hectáreas en la cual viven y trabajan en la agricultura y también se dedica a la ganadería pero su fuerte es la agricultura siembra maíz, que esta para cosechar y va a sembrar papa para eso utilizara el crédito para la compra de semillas y para lo que es el preparado de la tierra, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mr. Timoteo was born in Cochabamba on October 14, 1955.  He came to Santa C. 41 years ago in search of a better life which he found in Los Amarillos, 15 kms from Limoncito.  He is married to Mrs. Peregrina and they have two children.  

He owns 10 acres of farmland which is where they live and work.  He also raises livestock but his main activity is growing corn which is now ready for harvest.  He is planning to plant potatoes and will use the loan to buy seeds for the soil he is preparing.  He is a hard worker and grateful to the institution for the support he has received.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es: La  Sra. Estela es  una  persona  trabajadora  y muy  responsable, ella   tiene  una  tienda  de  abarrotes  la cual  atiende   personalmente y  de esta  manera  obtiene  sus  ingresos  para  mantener   su  hogar,  en esta  ocasión ella solicita  el crédito  para comprar  mercancía  para  su  negocio ya que  desea  ofrecer  una mayor  variedad de  productos  a  sus  clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Estela is a hard-working, responsible person.  She has a grocery store that she runs alone in order to earn an income to cover household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for her store since she would like to offer a wider variety of items to her customers.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es:
Flor María T. vive en un municipio cercano a la ciudad de Medellín y se dedica a la venta de pulpas de fruta, las cuales ella misma procesa. En su negocio la ayudan algunas personas de su familia quienes la acompañan en sus jornadas de trabajo de lunes a viernes.
Debido a la alta demanda de sus productos ha alcanzado a cubrir las necesidades de restaurantes cercanos, sin embargo ha encontrado problemas para poder adquirir la materia prima para sus pulpas.

Es por esto que Flor María necesita el dinero para poder comprar frutas tales como: Guanábana, Mora y Guayaba, y también para comprar empaques para el producto terminado debido a que ya cuentan con código de barras y logotipo. Flor está segura que tener la fruta suficiente para procesar se traduce en un mejor flujo de caja y logrará así posicionar su marca en el mercado.
texts.en:
Flor María T. lives in a town near Medellín and she sells fruit pulp that she processes herself. In her business, some family members help her, accompanying her at work from Monday through Friday.

Due to the high demand of her products, she has been able to cover the needs of nearby restaurants. Nonetheless, she has run into trouble being able to acquire raw materials for her pulps.  

This is why Flor María needs the money to be able to buy fruit, such as:  guanábana, rasberries, and  guayaba. She also needs to be able to buy packing material for the finished product since they already have a logo and a barcode. Flor is sure that having enough fruit to process translates into a better cash flow and thus she will be able to position her brand in the market.

loans.use: to buy fruit, packing material and baskets.

loans.name: Boriz

texts.es: La señor Boriz es padre de dos hijos por los cuales lucha en la vida por darles una buena educación, la actividad que tiene es la venta de dulces en una unidad educativa por la cual la rotación es diaria y opta con un crecimiento  gracias al crédito otorgado por la institución, el inicio de su negocio fue hace mucho tiempo atrás de manera muy simple y humilde obteniendo buenos resultados por el crecimiento del alumnado siendo esto así el esfuerzo de una persona con deseos de crecer en la vida realiza su trabajo todos los días a partir de las 07:00 pm hasta las 18:30 pm, para así darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y familia, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería como dulces y chocolates, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Boriz is a father of two children, for whom he struggles to geta good education. His activity is selling candies at a school. The turnover is daily and he has had growth thanks to a loan given to him by the institution. He started the business a long time ago. It was simple and humble and he obtained good results as the student body grew. It has been due to the hard work of a person who wants to grow in life. He works every day from 7:00 a.m. until 6:30 p.m. in order to give his children and family a better quality of life. With the money from the loan, he will buy merchandise such as candies and chocolate. He is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and candies.

loans.name: Basilidesa

texts.es: Basilidesa, D. 55 años, es una mujer muy amable y jovial.  Vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos mayores e independientes. Su mayor pasión D. Basilidesa, es el contacto con la gente, por ello ha buscado dedicarse a la venta D. ropa, zapatos, sabanas, cubre camas entre otros artículos para el hogar, D. acuerdo al pedio que le hacen, negocio que le va muy bien, ya que su gran carisma y su buen trato hacen que tenga mucha clientela.  A ella,  le gusta vender a crédito, ya que por esta modalidad gana mucho más, a pesar D. la demora en sus pagos; ya que cuanto más demoran les advierte que le cobrará más. Por ello, su mayor necesidad es contar con un capital suficiente, del modo que abastezca los pedidos pendientes que le hagan, y todas las tardes después D. sus labores domesticas, visita a sus clientes, realizando sus cobranzas y aprovecha ofrecerles lo que tiene. Su mayor  anhelo,  en un futuro es poner un bazar en su casa, o D. lo contrario asociarse con su hermana y realizar manualidades. Es su noveno crédito que tiene con MFP, y  sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro y con mayor tranquilidad sin traerle complicaciones a su grupo comunal, donD. es muy querida por el resto D. sus socias. D. obtener el crédito que solicita, comprará más polos, pantalones, camisas entre otras prendas casuales, para atender el pedido D. sus clientes.
texts.en:
Basilidesa is 55 years old.  She is a very kind and cheerful woman who lives in her own home with her husband and three children who are grown up and independent.  Basilidesa's great passion is having contact with people which is why she started a business selling clothes, shoes, sheets, bedspreads and other household items depending on what people request.  Her business is doing very well since her great charisma and good customer service mean that she has a lot of customers.  Basilidesa likes to sell on credit.  She says that you earn a lot more in this way, in spite of the delay in receiving payment, as you warn your customers that the longer they delay in making their payments, the more you will charge them.  Basilidesa's greatest need is to have enough capital so that she can proviD. goods for the pending orders that she has.

Every afternoon, after doing her housework, Basilidesa visits her customers and collects payments.  She also takes advantage of this and offers them what products she has.  Her greatest wish, in the future, is to set up a store in her home or go into business with her sister making handicrafts.

This is Basilidesa's ninth loan from MFP and she knows that if she makes her repayments on time she will be able to access a future loan more easily without making trouble for her community bank where she is very well liked by her fellow members.  Basilidesa will use this loan to buy more tops, pants, shirts and other casual clothes to fill her customers' orders.

loans.use: to buy more clothes

loans.name: Sagrado Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.en: Evelyn Yaneth is 37 years old and married. She has four children and three are currently in school. She works in a general store and has five years experience running the business. She started out selling small goods in the schools in her area and is now happy to have her own location. Her husband works as a merchant and helps support the family. Evelyn is requesting a loan as part of the ¨Sagrado Corazon D. Jesus¨ Group in order to stock her store with goods so that she may increase her income. Her goal is to one day own a large store with solid and consistent income. Other members of the group are involved in the following business activities: breadmaking, food service, pharmacy, and jewlery sales.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her general store.

loans.name: Julia Janet

texts.es:
Julia de 32 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones a futuro. Por eso es maestra de una escuela “Mixta Salesiana”. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 15h00pm todos los días. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones de seguir trabajando ya que no está casada pero tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad.  Por ahora quiere construir mejor su casa para poder darle una mejor vida a su hijo. Quiere el préstamo para comprar cemento, zinc, bloques.
texts.en:
32 year-old Julia is a hard-working woman who has many aspirations for the future.  She is a teacher at 'Mixta Salesiana' school.  She works from 7.00am to 3.00pm every day.

Julia has many aspirations to continue working since she is not married but has a 5 year-old son.  Right now, she would like to better build her home in order to be able to provide her son with a better life.  She would like this loan to buy cement, metal sheets and blocks.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal sheets and blocks

loans.name: Mario De Jesús

texts.es:
Mario de Jesús S. es de Medellín y trabaja desde hace 26 años vendiendo café en un carrito ambulante por la calles del occidente de la ciudad. Comenzó gracias al apoyo del gerente de una empresa textil a quien Mario le pidió permiso para hacer la venta de su café en la salida del edificio.

Mario trabaja actualmente desde las 6 am y con este negocio ha logrado salir adelante y mantener a su familia, es por esto que está buscando capitalizarse y poder mejorar su inventario además de hacer algunas reparaciones a su carro ambulante para su correcto funcionamiento.
texts.en:
Mario de Jesús S. is from Medellín and he has been selling coffee from a mobile cart for 26 years.  He sells his coffee in the streets, in the west of the capital city.  He started out in his business thanks to the support of the manager of a textile company who Mario asked permission from in order to sell his coffee outside the building's exit.

Mario currently works from 6.00am and his business has enabled him to get ahead in life and support his family.  For this reason, he is looking to inject capital into his business and improve his stock.  He would also like to make some repairs to his mobile cart so that it works properly.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: María Luz Dary

texts.es:
María Luz Dary M. vive en Medellín e inició su negocio hace 12 años mientras trabajaba con su esposo vendiendo sandalias. Después de aprender el oficio, se independizó de su esposo y empezó a vender otros productos como ropa de niños, medias, camisetas y ropa interior.

Inicialmente María Luz Dary era una persona muy tímida porque venía del campo, pero rápidamente tomó la decisión de tener su propio negocio y dejar atrás su timidez y por eso ahora consigue por su propia cuenta el dinero para ayudar a su familia.  Ella ahora quiere aumentar el volumen de sus ventas y por eso necesita el dinero para incrementar su inventario de productos. Con esto lo que busca es poder ofrecer mejores cosas para sus clientes y seguir mejorando su calidad de vida como hasta ahora lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
María Luz Dary M. lives in Medellín.  She started her business 12 years ago while she worked with her husband selling sandals.  After learning the trade, she started working independently from her husband and started selling other products such as children's clothes, tights, t-shirts and underwear.

María Luz Dary used to be a very shy person because she came from the countryside.  However, she quickly took the decision to own her own business and leave her shyness behind.  She now works for herself and makes money to help her family.  María would now like to increase her sales volume and needs money to do this, so that she can increase her product inventory.  She would like to be able to offer better products to her customers and continue improving her quality of life as she has done up until now.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Jesus Everardo

texts.es: El Sr. Jesús Everardo, es un cliente distinguido de esta institución, y va por el tercer crédito ya que los anteriores los ha utilizado en mejorar su vivienda, en esta  ocasión a solicitado el crédito porque tenia que liquidar unos muebles que tuvo que sacar en pagos para su esposa debido a que por circunstancias anteriores  en  sus labores ahora padece de dolor de espalda y ella necesitaba unos aparatos  y un mueble especial para su columna, el Sr. Jesús siempre ha sido un buen padre y buen esposo, y se preocupaba mucho por su  familia es  por  ello  que  el Sr. Jesús  Everardo  esta  muy agradecido  con  esta  institución.
texts.en:
Jesús Everardo is a distinguished client of this institution and this will be his third loan.  He used his previous loans to improve his home.

On this occasion, Jesús requested a loan because he needed to make payments on some furniture that he had to buy on credit for his wife because, owing to previous circumstances in her work, she now suffers from a bad back and she needed some equipment and a special piece of furniture for her spine.  Jesús has always been a good father and a good husband and looked after his family.  He is very grateful to our institution.

loans.use: to buy special equipment

loans.name: Alicia Delmira

texts.es:
La señora Alicia Delmira C. tiene 36 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella, su esposo el señor Jesus Flores se dedica a la soldadura.
Doña Alicia y su familia viven desde hace 10 años en la aldea Agua Caliente dedicandose desde hace 3 años a la comercializacion de alimentos como ser desayunos, almuerzos, cenas y golosinas, ademas vende abarroteria en su pulperia.

Doña Alicia es una persona emprendedora, tiene un proyecto con su esposo en un futuro de hacer una cancha para jugar futbol para rentarla a los jovenes de esa zona.

el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria.

Alicia empezara a vender licuados de frutas tambien,  ya que estos se venden muy bien en la zona.

Su mayor deseo es construir esa cancha ya que ella y su esposo esperan tener ganancias y sobre todo aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Alicia Delmira C. is 36-years-old. She's married and has two children who depend on her. Her husband, Mr. Jesus Flores, is a metal worker. Alicia and her family have lived for 10 years in the village of Agua Caliente, and for 3 years have worked in food service, selling breakfast, lunch, dinners, and sweets. She also sells groceries at her general store. 

Alicia is an enterprising person. She has a project with her husband for the future; they want to make a soccer field to rent out to young people in the area. 

She will use the credit to buy groceries for her store.

Alicia will also begin to sell fruit smoothies because they sell well in the area.

Her greatest wish is to build the soccer field because she and her husband hope to gain income and above all increase their sales.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, milk, water, meat, pork, chicken, dairy products, coffee, rice, sugar, butter, oil, margarine, and flour

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires, batteries, upholstery and to make some other repairs

loans.name: Embajadores 3 Group

texts.en:
Elsa is the coordinator of her group, Embajadores 3 (Ambassadors). She lives in the city of La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

Elsa has been selling food for over 2 years, She invested some savings to start running her business. She operates a food store, where she sells different goods and meals,  and she will use this loan to increase her inventory by purchasing different goods.

She lives with 1 child of three she had, along with her long-term partner.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, sugar, rice, etc.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma; la socia tiene 39 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de carne, ella trabaja en el mercado central de la ciudad de cusco en el mercado de nombre San Pedro, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería para su negocio de venta de carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Richary Runa Communal Bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Ms. Irma is 39 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one son. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling meat. Irma works in the San Pedro Market, which is the central market in Cusco. She has been in this business for years and it brings her both personal and economic satisfaction. Irma is a very cheerful and responsible woman.

She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her meat-selling business.

Irma is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy meat for her business

loans.name: Mercy Marlene

texts.es:
La Señora. Mercy B. es socia del banco comunal Virgen de Bronce, vive por el sector de la Virgen del Bronce en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad está bañada por 4 ríos dándole el nombre de  Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, tiene muchos lugares turísticos y su gente es amable, cordial, muy culta y llena de tradiciones.

La Señora. Mercy tiene 33 años, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 14, 6 y 1 año de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y su segunda hija en una escuelita de la ciudad. Vive en la casa de su papá que es propia.

Doña Mercy trabaja en la venta de librillo (carne para la preparación de guatita que es un plato típico), trabaja de lunes a viernes sin un horario fijo.

Está en el banco comunal hace 6 años, tiempo el cual los créditos le han ayudado para crecer poco a poco en su negocio,  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de librillo.

Su meta es  viajar a distintas partes del mundo.

Nuestra socia está en la fotografía con su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
Mercy B. is a member of the 'Virgen de Bronce' community bank.  She lives in 'Virgen de Bronce' neighborhood, in the city of Cuenca.  This city is home to 4 rivers and is known as 'Santa Ana of the Four Rivers'.  There are a lot of tourist attractions and the people are kind, polite, very cultured and full of traditions.

Mercy is 33 years old.  She is a single mother and has three children aged 14, 6 and 1.  Her eldest son is in high school and her second child (a girl) attends a local elementary school.  She lives in her dad's home which he owns.

Mercy's business is selling tripe (this is used in preparing 'guatita' - tripe stew - which is a traditional dish).  She works from Monday to Friday but doesn't work regular hours.

Mercy has been a member of her community bank for 6 years.  The loans she has received have helped her to gradually grow her business.  She will invest her new loan in buying 'librillo'.

Mercy's goal is to travel to different parts of the world.  She appears in the photo with her young daughter.

loans.use: to buy tripe

loans.name: Maria Nohemy

texts.es:
La señora Maria Nohemy B. tiene 49 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella.
Su esposo se dedica a la fabricacion de balcones, juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus hijos.

La señora Maria Nohemy B. tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion en la colonia San Francisco de la  ciudad de San Lorenzo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria ya que desea surtir su negocio para la epoca de semana santa.
 
Maria es una mujer de buenos principios, seria y responsable.
texts.en:
Maria Nohemy B. is 49 years old, married, and has two children who depend on her.  Her husband makes balconies.  The couple work hard to get their children and themselves ahead in life.

Maria Nohemy B. has a grocery store in her home which is located in San Francisco neighborhood, in the city of San Lorenzo.  She will use this loan to buy groceries since she would like to stock her business for Holy Week.

Maria is a woman with good principles.  She is serious and responsible.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, butter, vegetables, oil, corn flour, wheat flour, toilet paper, coffee and bread

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: León Darío

texts.es:
León Darío C. vive en la ciudad de Medellín. Hace 10 años comenzó con su negocio, una tienda donde vendía diferentes productos, pero hace 3 años decidió cambiar su actividad y se dedicó a la panadería. Actualmente él es la única persona que trabaja en el local por lo que debe cerrarlo cuando algún cliente hace pedidos a domicilio. 

León Darío debe salir a entregarlos él mismo por lo que ha pensado en la necesidad de vincular a otra persona que le ayude, sin embargo por el momento, la solución para agilizar las entregas, es poder acceder al crédito para comprar un vehículo (moto) y así poder hacer los domicilios más rápido, lo que evitaría que tenga que cerrar su negocio durante largos períodos de tiempo.
texts.en:
León Darío C. lives in the city of Medellín.  He started his own business 10 years ago: a store where he sold different products.  However, 3 years ago he decided to change business and start a bakery.  Currently, he is the only person who works in his bakery which means that he has to close it when customers make orders for home delivery.

As León Darío must go out to deliver his orders, he has considered working with another person who can help him.  However, at the moment his solution for speeding up his deliveries is to take a loan and buy a vehicle (motorbike) which will help him make his deliveries more quickly.  This will mean that he will no longer have to close his business for long periods of time.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for making his deliveries

loans.name: Jesus Esta Aqui 3 Group

texts.en:
Margarita is the coordinator of his group, Jesus está Aquí (Jesus is Here). Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) generally. Her group is located in the slums that ring the capital city. Here, crime is rampant and running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children.

Margarita is excited to be taking her 4th loan with Esperanza, a Kiva partner, after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business selling tennis and casual shoes by purchasing 4 crates of tennis shoes to sell in her community. She will use the profits to finish building her home. She started with some of her savings and now she is planning to dedicate her benefits to the house. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy tennis and casual shoes

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene 35 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades con el negocio de venta de artesanía ella vende todo los que son chompas de alpaca, polos, gorros, pantalones,guantes,chalinas entre otros más, la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio el cual se encuentra ubicado en el centro de la ciudad en la calle procuradores de la plaza de armas de Cusco, la socia es una persona bien emprendedora, optimista y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante, a la vez la socia cuenta con su casita que está terminando de construir para luego alquilarlo y así tener un ingreso mas para su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una pequeña mercadería de artesanía y el resto para comprar algunas cositas que le faltan para terminar de construir su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Richary Runa Communal Bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Ms. Luz Marina is 35 years old, married, and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling artisanal crafts. She sells alpaca wool sweaters, shirts, hats, pants, gloves, scarves, and other items. She has been in this business for a good number of years. Her business can be found in the city center, on Calle Procuradores near Cusco's Plaza de Armas. Luz Marina is a very entrepreneurial and optimistic woman with a great desire to move forward. She is currently finishing construction of a house that she will rent out in order to have an additional source of income for her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy a little bit of merchandise for her store. She will use the rest to buy certain things she needs in order to finish building her house. 

Luz Marina is happy to receive this loan and she promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy a little bit of merchandise for her crafts store and to buy a few things she needs to finish building her house

loans.name: Yeni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yeni; la socia tiene 31 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción como ladrillos,yeso,cemento entre otros más la socia lleva un par de años en este negocio el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja ella es masajista de profesión pero actualmente no ejerce su carrera ya que tiene su hijo muy pequeño que necesita de ella es por eso que la socia se dedico a este negocio con su pareja.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar más material de construcción para así poder tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the ” RICHARY RUNA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The associate is Señora Yeni.  She is 31 years of age and lives with her partner and her child.  The associate alternates her activities with the business of selling contruction supplies such as bricks, gypsum, cement and more.  The associate has had this business for two years, which she works jointly with her partner.  She is a masseuse by profession but at present she does not practice her trade because she has a very small son that needs her.  That is why the associate is dedicated to this business with her partner.  

The associate requests the loan to buy more building materials in order to be able to have more variety to offer her clients.  

The associate is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy more construction materials in order to have a greater variety to offer her clients.

loans.name: Jesus Octavio

texts.es:
Jesús Octavio S. vive hace 15 años en Medellín. Él trabajaba como electricista en el municipio de Puerto Berrío a varias horas de la ciudad, sin embargo decidió probar suerte en la ciudad para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

Gracias a la ayuda de un amigo comenzó a vender chicles y cigarrillos en la calle, pero tenía muchos problemas porque las autoridades no querían darle el permiso para realizar sus ventas. Luego de algunos intentos logró conseguir el permiso; ahora quiere capitalizarse y tener más productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jesús Octavio S. has been living in Medellín for 15 years.  He used to work as an electrician in the town of Puerto Berrío, several hours from the city.  However, he decided to try his luck in the city in order to improve his living conditions.

Thanks to the help of a friend, Jesús started out selling chewing gum and cigarettes in the street.  However, he experienced a lot of problems because the authorities didn't want to provide him with the permit he needed to make his sales.  After a number of attempts, he managed to get his permit.  Now he would like to inject capital into his business and stock up with more products to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Jose Baldelomar

texts.es: José tiene 53 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras. José tiene que levantarse temprano todos los días para traer sus cosechas y llevarlas a ofrecer al mercado, el es un hombre muy responsable por lo que disfruta de tener este medio de vida. Este no es el primer financiamiento que realiza por lo que se encuentra  muy contento con esta oportunidad. Son más de 26 años, de tener en este medio de vida, por lo que ha luchado por mantenerse en esta actividad.  Este crédito es para la compra de naranjas, aguacates, sandias, mangos y buscar el medio de transporte para ofrecer sus frutas.
texts.en:
Jose is 53 years old. He sells fruits and vegetables. He has to get up early every day to collect the produce and take them to the market. Jose is a very responsible man who enjoys his way of life.

This is not his first loan and he is very happy to be given this opportunity. He has had this kind of work for more than 26 years putting a lot of time and effort into maintaining it. The loan will be used to buy oranges, avocados, melons, mangos and to find transportation to deliver the fruits.

loans.use: to buy oranges, avocados, mangos y to find transportation for the fruits.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carmen; la socia tiene 33 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de sastrería ella elabora ropa para niños y adultos ropa en general como buzos, camisas, ternos, vestidos entre otros más, la socia lleva años en este negocio con el cual está sacando a sus hijos adelante, la socia es una persona bien alegre y optimista y tiene las ganas de continuar trabajando para ellos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar de material para su negocio como telas, hilos, agujas, cierres entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the ” RICHARY RUNA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The associate is Señora Carmen.  She is 33 years of age and lives with her partner and their 3 children.  The associate alternates her daily activities wtih the business of tailoring.  She makes clothes for children and adults in general such as track suits, shirts, 3-piece suits, and dresses, among other things.  The associate has years in this business, with which she is moving her children ahead.  The associate is an optimistic and very happy person and she has the desire to continue working for her children.  

The associate requests the loan to buy material for her business such as fabric, thread, needles, fasteners and more.  

The associate is happy for the loan and she promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business such as fabric, thread, needles, fasteners and more.

loans.name: Blanca Magdalena

texts.es:
La Señora. Blanca Mejia es socia del banco comunal Virgen de Bronce, vive por el sector de la avenida de Las Americas en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta bañada por 4 ríos dándole el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, tiene muchos lugares turísticos y su gente es amable, cordial, muy culta y llena de tradiciones.

Doña Blanca es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 32, 29 y 12 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados e independientes y su ultimo hijo estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es comerciante, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
Doña Blanca labora en su taller de costura, ella aprendió corte y confección en una academia, trabaja de lunes a viernes sin un horario fijo ya que es su propio negocio.

Este es el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de telas.

Su sueño es viajar a distintos lugares del mundo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Blanca Mejia is a member of the communal bank ‘Virgen de Bronce’. She lives in the area Avenida de las Americas in the city of Cuenca. This city is surrounded by four rivers which give it its name, Santa Ana of the Four Rivers. It has many touristic sites and its people are kind, cordial, polite and full of tradition.

Mrs. Blanca is married and has three children who are 32, 29 and 12 years old. The two older ones are married and independent; the youngest son attends school in the city. Her husband is a merchant and through their work they were able to build their own house.

Mrs. Blanca works in her sewing workshop. She learned dressmaking at an academy and works from Monday through Friday with a flexible schedule, since it is her own business.

This is her fourth loan through the communal bank 'Virgen de Bronce' and will be used to buy fabrics. Her dream is to travel to different parts of the world.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Daniel; el tiene 59 años de edad y es viudo y tiene 5 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio, él socio cuenta con un carro que realiza el servicio de mudanza el trabaja de lunes a domingo por el día ,su horario puede variar de acuerdo a la actividad que pueda realizar durante el día, el socio es una persona bien responsable y dedicado a sus hijos aun que ya sean adultos sus hijos el igual sigue apoyándolos en lo que puede, él socio desea continuar de esta forma seguir trabajando para su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y comprar algunos accesorios que le hacen falta. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the ” RICHARY RUNA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The associate is Señor Daniel.  He is 59 years of age, widowed and has 5 children.  The associate alternates his daily activities with his business.  The associate relies on a car that he uses for a moving service which he works from Monday to Sunday during the day.  His schedule can vary according to the activity that he can carry out during the day.  The associate is a very responsible person and dedicated to his children even though they are already adults.  He continues supporting them in that which he is able.  The associate desires to continue in this way working for his family.  

The associate requests the loan to carry out maintenance of his car and to buy some accessories that he needs.  

The associate is happy for the loan and he promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to maintain his car and buy some accessories that it lacks.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La señora Vilma Z. tiene 55 años de edad, esta soltera y no tiene dependientes, vive con dos nietos de sus hijos que estan en los Estados Unidos.
Vilma vive en la colonia San Francisco desde hace 18 años en donde se a dedicado a la elaboracion y venta de pan casero y golosinas.
Doña vilma a sido una mujer reponsable en sus compromisos y muy trabajadora.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion del pan casero, ademas desea comprar unos materiales para reparar el techo de la galera en donde tiene el horno para el pan. 

Su sueño es que su familia este unida ya que tres de sus hijos viven en los Estado unidos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Vilma Z. is 55 years old, single and does not have dependents. She lives with two of her children’s children because they live in the United States.

She has lived in the community of San Francisco for 18 years where she bakes homemade bread and makes sweets. Mrs. Vilma is a hard worker and responsible woman in all her dealings.

The loan will be utilized to buy the materials needed the repair the roof of the shed where she has her oven and ingredients to bake breads.  

Her dream is to keep her family together since three of her children live in the United States now.

loans.use: to buy firewood, timber, sheet zinc, flour, corn, lard, margarine, baking powder, sugar and milk.

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Diana Carolina Ruíz C. quien quedó embarazada a muy temprana edad, debió asumir son rol con gran responsabilidad pues además de terminar sus estudios en el colegio debía trabajar para cubrir los gastos de su bebé y los suyos, fue entonces cuando decidió dedicarse a la venta de mercancía. 

En el futuro Diana espera ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija, por ello, espera convertir su negocio que actualmente es en su propia casa en un local reconocido. 

Actualmente esta madrea cabeza de hogar necesita de un préstamo para comprar más mercancía y así ofrecer mayor variedad e incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en: Diana Carolina Ruíz C. became pregnant at a very early age and had to show a lot of responsibility as well as finish her studies at high school.  She had to work to cover her baby's expenses, as well as her own.  It was then she decided to work selling merchandise.  In the future, Diana hopes to offer her daughter a better quality of life.  For this reason she hopes to move her business from her home to a known shop.  Currently, this single mother needs a loan to buy more merchandise and be able to offer a greater variety of products and increase sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Ninoska Del Rosario

texts.es: Ninoska Del Rosario tiene 24 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, este negocio empezó porque no tenía los suficientes ingresos para mantener su hogar y a su hijo de 6 años de edad que está a su cargo. Ella ha realizado ciertas mejoras a su vivienda que ha considerado un éxito en su vida, por lo que ha sido una persona que ha luchado por obtener algo que dejarle a su hijo para un futuro. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de materia prima como pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos, trajes de baño entre otros productos que le han solicitado.
texts.en: Ninoska Del Rosario is 24 years old and works selling new clothing.  She started this business because she did not have enough income to maintain her home and her 6 year old son who is under her care.  She has made some improvements to her home and she believes this to be an accomplishment in her life.  She has been someone who has fought to get something to leave to her son in the future.  The loan she is requesting is for buying clothing: pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, swim suits, and other products that have been requested.

loans.use: To buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, swimsuits, and other products that have been requested of her.

loans.name: Las Colmena 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Hilcia is the group coordinator of Las Colmenas. Her story is representative of the others in her group and more generally of Esperanza's Dominican and Haitian clients. Hilcia is a single mother of two who lives in the Samana province of the Dominican Republic. She lives in a rented house, that has unreliable access to running water (not potable) and electricity, with her two children and her long-term partner.

This is Hilcia's 4th loan with Esperanza. She started her business with the first loan she received from Esperanza Internacional, around 2 years ago. She plans to use it to buy clothing to sell in her retail business. She will purchase pants, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, and shirts to sell out of her home to the others in her community.

Hilcia wants to use the profits from her business to help improve the living conditions for her family. Thanks to her good investments and because she has saved, she has been able to bring changes to her family. She hopes to be able to save enough money to continuing improving her family life and to purchase her own house. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses and skirts

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza Del Bosque Group

texts.es: Orfelinda D. L. C. V. D. 44 años D. edad, es separada y tiene 1 hijo, hace mas D. 10 años que se vino D. su natal Amazonas ha vivir en L. zona del Bosque en Carabayllo - Lima - Perú, empezó su negocio vendiendo hielo y con un teléfono público, hace casi año y medio empezo con su bodeguita. Con su negocio a logrado cercar su casita con ladrillos y mejorar su economía. Actualmente desea tener una bodega bien equipadita y con variedad D. productos. El préstamo que le ha dado EDAPROSPO lo invertirá en compra D. mas productos .
texts.en: Orfelinda D. L. C. V. is 44 years old, separated, and has one son.  More than 10 years ago she came from her home in the Amazon region to live in the Bosque en Carabayllo zone in Lima, Peru.  She began a business selling ice and renting a public telephone.  Almost a year and a half ago she started her little grocery store.  With this business, she has been able to build a brick fence around her house and improve her quality of life.  She currently desires to have a grocery store that is well-stocked with a variety of products.  She will use the loan from EDAPROSPO to buy more products.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Norma Jadida

texts.es:
La Señora Norma B. es socia del banco comunal Virgen de Bronce, vive por el sector de la Virgen del Bronce en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad esta  bañada por 4 ríos dándole el nombre de Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, tiene muchos lugares turísticos, su gente es amable, cordial,  muy culta y llena de tradiciones.

Doña Norma tiene 31 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 11 y 9 años que estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como albañil, con el trabajo y sacrificio conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de pollos y chanchos, actividad que la realiza para ayudar en la economía de su hogar y también así puede estar en casa para cuidar de sus hijos.

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y  lo va a invertir en la construcción de un galpón más grande para sus pollos.

Su meta es culminar sus estudios de bachillerato.
texts.en:
Norma B. is a member of the 'Virgen de Bronce' community bank.  She lives in Virgen de Bronce neighborhood, in the city of Cuenca.  This city is home to four rivers and is known as 'Santa Ana of the Four Rivers'.  There are a lot of tourist attractions and the people are kind, polite, very cultured and full of traditions.

Norma is 31 years old, married, and has two children aged 11 and 9 who attend school in the city.  Her husband is a construction worker.  Through their joint work and sacrifice, the couple have managed to build their own home.

Norma's business is raising and selling chickens and pigs.  She does this work in order to help with their household finances.  It also means that she can be at home to take care of her children.

This is Norma's second loan through her community bank and she will invest it in building a bigger shed for her chickens.  Her goal is to finish her high school studies.

loans.use: to build a chicken shed

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Arturo; el tiene 73 años de edad y es casado y tiene 5 hijos; el socio  cuenta con un carro que realiza el servicio de mudanza el trabaja de lunes a domingo por el día ,pero su horario puede variar de acuerdo a la actividad que pueda realizar durante el día, anteriormente el socio trabajo en entidades estatales y una vez jubilado decidió comprarse su carrito y es la actividad que actualmente realiza, él socio es una persona bien responsable y dedicado a sus hijos y el solo desea continuar trabajando por su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y comprar algunos accesorios que le hacen falta. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the ” RICHARY RUNA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The associate is Señor Arturo.  He is 73 years of age and married with 5 children.  The associate relies on a car which he uses for a moving service.  He works from Monday to Sunday during the day, but his schedule can change according to the activities that he can carry out during the day.  Previously the associate worked in state companies and, once retired, he decided to buy his car for the activity that he carries out at present.  He is a very responsible person and dedicated to his children.  He only wants to continue working for his family.  

The associate requests the loan to carry out maintenance on his car and to buy some accessories that he needs.  

The associate is happy for the loan and he promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to maintain his car and to buy some accessories that it needs.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys, de 58 años, es una mujer muy tierna y amable. Es separada y vive junto a sus dos hijos de los 5 que tiene  en total. Hace más de 13 años Gladys se dedica en la venta de productos de belleza, zapatos, ropa casual, maletas entre otras cosas que le piden sus clientes. El negocio que realiza le gusta mucho, por ello siempre esta visitando a sus clientes, y en cuanto le hagan sus requerimientos, acude a los  emporios comerciales del centro de  Lima; si se trata de prendas, en caso de calzados, viaja a la provincia de Chiclayo, de donde compra al por mayor y a menor precio, y solo así gana mucho más, a pesar de sus pasajes y otros gastos. Por ello, prefiere dejar a crédito, y así captar mayores utilidades, aunque se demoren en pagarle. Y, ahora requiere contar con tu ayuda, para abastecerse de más mercaderías y continuar desarrollando su negocio. Pero, lo que también, anhela es dedicarse al arte culinario, por ello en adelante cuando tenga mayor capital,  le gustaría instalar un restaurante en un local céntrico de la ciudad. Es su 22avo crédito que tiene con MFP, dice “estar agradecido por la ayuda que recibió y que recibirá en esta oportunidad; y que no desconfíen, ya que pagará puntualmente sus cuotas”. Gladys, compra mercaderías necesarias cada 20 días, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará más  prendas casuales y zapatos, para abastecer sus pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
58 year-old Gladys is a very loving and kind woman.  She is separated and lives with two of her five children.  For more than 13 years, she has been selling beauty products, shoes, casual clothes, suitcases and other products that her customers ask her for.  She really enjoys her business and is always visiting her customers.  As soon as her customers make requests, she heads to the department stores in the middle of Lima.  If, however, they request footwear, she travels to Chiclayo province where she can buy wholesale, for a lower price.  In this way she earns a lot more, in spite of having to pay for her transport and other expenses.  Gladys prefers to offer her goods on credit because that way she makes more profits, even if her customers take a long time to pay her.

Right now, Gladys would like to be able to count on your help so that she can stock her business with more merchandise and continue to make progress.  What Gladys would also really like to do is work in the culinary profession.  In the future, when she has more capital, she would like to set up a restaurant in a central location in the city.

This is Glady's 22nd loan from MFP and she says that she is grateful for the help that she has received in the past and also for the help she will receive on this occasion.  She says that she can be trusted to make her loan repayments on time.  Gladys buys merchandise that she needs every 20 days.  She will use the loan she has requested to buy more casual clothes and shoes in order to fill some orders that she has.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and footwear

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Cesar; el tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio trabaja en empresas privadas como seguridad actualmente está trabajando en una empresa de lunes a sábado, el socio siempre trabajo en este rubro y se siente feliz ya que mediante este trabajo el saca a su familia adelante, el socio necesita un arma de fuego para su trabajo sin eso no puede cumplir bien su función.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una arma de fuego para su trabajo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the ” RICHARY RUNA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The associate is Señor Cesar.  He is 34 years of age and lives with his partner and their son.  The associate works in private businesses as a security guard.  Currently he works in a business from Monday to Saturday.  The associate has always worked in this area and he feels happy since by means of this work he moves his family ahead.  The associate needs a firearm for his work since, without that, he cannot perform his function well.  

The associate requests the loan for the purchase of a firearm for his work.  

The associate is happy for the loan and he promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy a firearm for his security work.

loans.name: Carlota

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carlota; la socia tiene 38 años de edad, separada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de tamales ella trabaja en el mercado central del Cusco (mercado San Pedro), ella trabaja de lunes a domingo por las mañanas, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le trae muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales ya que mediante este negocio la socia saca a su hijo adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar de insumos para su negocio como maíz, manteca, mantequilla entre 
otros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Carlota belongs to the communal bank "Richary Runa."  This bank is located in the Cusco district of Cusco province.

Carlota is 38 years old, separated, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling tamales.  She works in the central market of Cusco (the San Pedro market.)  She works every day in the morning.  Carlota has had this business for a number of years and it has brought  her a lot of satisfaction, both personal as well as financial, because through the business she has been able to provide for her son.  

Carlota needs a loan to purchase supplies for her business such as corn, lard,  butter, and other items.

Carlota is pleased to have this loan, and she is committed to making all of her scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business such as corn, lard, butter, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, skirts and sandals

loans.name: Angélica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Angélica; la socia tiene 40 años de edad, separada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de lechos (plato hecho a base de chancho), la socia vende en el distrito de Wanchaq en el mercado del mismo nombre todas las mañanas ella lleva años en este negocio y de esta manera la socia saca  sus hijos adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como  cebolla, carné de chancho, aderezó entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: This borrower belongs to the Richary Runa Communal Bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco. Ms. Angélica is 40 years old, separated, and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling lechos (a pork-based dish). She sells every morning in the district of Wanchaq, in a market by the same name. She has been running this business for years and it has been the means by which she has helped her children get ahead. She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for her business, such as onion, pork meat, and seasonings, among others. Ms. Angélica is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like onions, pork, and seasonings

loans.name: Sonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Sonia del Carmen B. M., de 47 años de edad, vive en  su propia casa con su  esposo y tres hijas las cuales se encuentran estudiando. Sonia es una mujer emprendedora la cual ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para poder sacar adelante a su familia y sigue luchando día a día con la esperanza de que sus hijas tengan un mejor futuro. Posee un puesto donde vende tortas, hot dog y bebidas en la colonia los Tikales del Municipio de Apopa. Su puesto se encuentra ubicado frente a la escuela de la Urbanización, que es un lugar muy transitado por estudiantes y trabajadores de la zona que la prefieren por la calidad, precio, e higiene en sus productos y sobre todo por la confianza que ofrece a sus clientes ya que para ella el cliente es lo mas importante en su negocio y sabe que de esta  manera atrae a mas compradores y al mismo tiempo mayores ingresos. Ha decidido hacer un préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertirlo en su pequeño negocio el cual le permita comprar más productos como: pan, salchichas, aderezos, diferentes tipos de bebidas, y la variedad de productos que necesita un puesto de este tipo. De esta manera poder ofrecer y satisfacer las necesidades de más personas. Sin perder la visión de mejorar sus ganancias para poder brindar a sus hijas lo necesario para tener una vida digna.
texts.en:
Sonia del Carmen B. M. is 47 years old.  She lives in her own home with her husband and three children who are studying.  Sonia is an enterprising woman who has worked for a long time to get her family ahead in life and she continues working hard every day in the hope that her daughters will have a better future.

Sonia owns a stall where she sells sandwiches, hot dogs and soft drinks.  Her stall is located in Los Tikales neighborhood, in the town of Apopa, opposite the local school.  This is an area which is very busy with students and local workers who like coming to Sonia's stall for the quality, price and hygiene that she offers in her products.  Above all, they come for her friendly service because, for Sonia, customers are the most important part of her business and she knows that in this way she attracts more customers and also makes more income.

Sonia has decided to take a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her small business.  This will allow her to buy more products such as bread, sausages, dressings, different types of drinks and the whole range of products that a stall of this type needs.  In this way, she will be able to meet the needs of more people without losing sight of her vision of improving her profits in order to provide her daughters with what they need in order to lead a decent life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making top-quality sandwiches, hot dogs and drinks

location.town: Apopa en el departamento de San Salvador

loans.name: El Aguila Group

texts.es:
el grupo El Aguila esta formado por dos mujeres y un hombre los cuales ya tienen varios años de conocerse y trabajar juntos,  a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:

la sra. Eugenia A. se dedica a la venta de verduras y ropa, la que realiza de forma ambulante, siendo sus principales clientes los vecinos de la comunidad y también sale a vender a las aldeas cercanas y su hija mayor sale a vender a la montaña todos los fines de semana, esta actividad le permite generar ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares ya que su esposo cubre los de mas gastos que se originan en el hogar, su esposo se de dica a la producción de granos básicos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de verduras y ropa.     

el sr. Cesar Augusto Jacinto C. se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado negocio que tiene de realizar mas de 5 años, sus ventas las realiza de manera domiciliar en las diferentes aldeas y caseríos cercanos a su vivienda, las ventas las realiza los fines de semana, a su ves se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos durante la semana lo que contribuye a generarle otros ingresos y dejar de la cosecha para consumo de su familia,  su negocio le genera recursos económicos con los que suple las necesidades de hogar.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y calzado.


la sra. Digna Emerita O. vende ropa americana y calzado, contando con más de 1 año de experiencia en este tipo de actividad la que realiza de manera ambulante,  para la temporada de verano se prepara con un nuevo surtido de ropa, sandalias, calzonetas, blusas y camisetas que sus clientes le estan pidiendo.
el credito lo utilizara para la coampra de ropa y asi satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, ofrecerles de todo un poco para mejorar sus ventas y por consiguiente los ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
The 'El Aguila' (Eagle) group is made up of two women and one man who have known each other and worked together for several years.  Here we will provide details on the different business activities that they carry out:

Eugenia A.'s business is selling vegetables and clothes.  She makes her sales in an itinerant manner and her main customers are people who live in her community.  She also goes out to sell her products in nearby villages.  Her eldest daughter goes out to sell their products in the mountains every weekend.  This business allows Eugenia to make income to cover her family expenses since her husband covers their other household expenses.  Eugenia's husband produces basic grains.  Eugenia will use this loan to buy vegetables and clothes. 

Cesar Augusto Jacinto C.' business is selling clothes and footwear.  He has been in this business for more than 5 years.  He makes his sales door to door in nearby villages.  He makes his sales on a weekend.  During the week he grows basic grains which makes him additional income and also leaves enough over for his family's own consumption.  His business makes him money which he uses to cover his household needs.  He will use this loan to buy clothes and footwear. 

Digna Emerita O.'s business is selling American clothes and footwear.  She has more than one year's experience in this line of work and she makes her sales in an itinerant manner.  She is currently preparing for the summer season with a new stock of clothes, sandals, bathing costumes, blouses and t-shirts that her customers are asking for.  Digna will use her loan to buy clothes so that she can meet her customers' demands, offering them a little of everything in order to improve her sales and, consequently, her family income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, clothes and footwear

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Emma Elibeth

texts.es: Emma Elibeth ha recibido diferentes golpes de la vida, quien al lado de su hijo de ocho años ha salido adelante. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas de manera ambulante y en su vivienda, es una mujer muy emprendedora que disfruta de hablar con sus clientes y de proporcionar ingresos a su hogar. Ella en vista de las necesidades que han afrontado ha sido una luchadora incansable. Es por eso que ahora solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como aguacate, mangos, sandias, nísperos entre otras frutas.
texts.en: Emma Elibeth has met with many of life's difficulties, and, alongside her eight year old son, has moved forward.  She works selling fruit in the streets and in her home.  She is a very entrepreneurial woman who enjoys talking with her customers and budgeting her earnings for her home's expenses.  In view of the struggles she has encountered, she has been a tireless fighter.  For this reason she is asking for a loan to buy avocados, mangoes, watermelon, nísperos, and other fruits.

loans.use: to buy avocado, mangoes, watermelon, nísperos, and other fruits

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” RICHARY RUNA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Edith; la socia tiene 39 años de edad, separada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de tamales ella trabaja en el mercado central de la ciudad de Cusco (San Pedro), la socia trabaja todas las mañanas y en la tarde vende en la puerta de una institución privada, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como  manteca, maíz, entre otros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Richary Runa Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Ms. Edith is 39 years old, separated, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and a business selling tamales. She works every morning in the central market in the city of Cusco (San Pedro). In the afternoon, she sells outside a private institution. Edith is a cheerful woman with a great desire to succeed for her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy butter, corn, and other ingredients for her business.

Edith is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy butter, corn, and other ingredients

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es: El señor Hernán B. G. de 40 años de edad, habita solo en su propia casa en el Municipio de Santiago Texacuango. Hace 20 años empezó a trabajar como mecánico automotriz y hasta la fecha sigue luchando por mejor su calidad de vida y gracias a sus esfuerzos ha logrado establecer un pequeño  taller de mecánica en el Municipio de Santa Tecla del Departamento de la Libertad, también atiende clientes en su casa de Santiago Texacuangos . Gracias a su carisma y dedicación al trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de los habitantes del municipio y cada día lo prefieren más ya que su principal objetivo es satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Esto ha generado una mayor demanda de sus servicios por lo que  ha decidido invertir  en su pequeño negocio para poder satisfacer mejor a las personas que requieren de sus servicios. Es por esto que solicita este crédito para  poder comprar herramientas como: llaves, aceite, tenazas, entre otros. De esta manera satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y al mismo tiempo poder mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mr. Hernán B. G. is 40 years old and lives alone in his own home in the city of Santiago Texacuangos.  Twenty years ago he began working as an auto mechanic and, to this day, is still striving to improve his quality of life.  Thanks to his efforts, he has opened a small auto shop in the city of Santa Tecla in the Libertad zone.  He also has customers who come to his house in Santiago Texacuangos.  Thanks to his charisma and dedication to his work, he has been able to earn the trust of the city's residents and each day their preference for him grows since his main goal is satisfying their needs.
